title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Rebelling against the routine gets you nowhere fast today. You struggle to understand the wondrous workings of the cosmos when its magic seems to fail you. Perhaps an opportunity perfectly poised to fall into your lap instead lands in someone elses. Its all too easy to lapse into a slow dance for a pity-party of one today. Or even worse, you might become envious of another persons good fortune. Of course, youre entitled to feel your fair share of disappointment. But remember, when a door slams, theres often a window opening. Look for the treasure hidden underneath the rock. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
